4.0 Team Skill 3¶
4.1 Introduction¶
This document maps out the user needs and features of the Kareer Mart System. 
4.1.1 Purpose of Vision Document¶
Kareer Mart aims to provide both Job Seekers and Recruiters the tools to actively manage their job search and recruitment needs respectively. This document defines all expected high-level functionality of the Kareer Mart system.
